posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

08/09/21 - 08/15/21
Issue - V65
Current Release: 0.86.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Streamlit Updates

  • Check out the Streamlit sharing badge for your GitHub repos:
  • Learn more about what it’s like to work at Streamlit with our awesome new Careers page! And BTW we’re hiring
  • Calling all professors and teachers! We’re looking to develop an Education Program and would love your insight and feedback on Streamlit in the classroom

Featured Content

  • Broken Links Finder
  • Sharing micro-computed tomography(MCT) image analysis in dentistry @mediangs
  • STREAMLIT Python TRICKS - make your WEB APP look BETTER in 6 Minutes |Machine Learning| Data Science @AvratanuBiswas

Tutorials/Introduction

  • QR Code Generator App with Streamlit and Python @Jesse_JCharis
  • How to deploy machine learning model web app in Python using Streamlit
  • Building a Search Engine Scraper with Streamlit
  • OCR com Pytesseract e Streamlit
  • Streamlit: A new way to prototype interactive UI in Python
  • Deploy and share your sentiment analysis app using Streamlit Sharing
  • Advanced Streamlit: Session State and Callbacks for Data Labelling Tool
  • Streamlit Session Part 1
  • Streamlit Session Part 2
  • Streamlit Session Part 3
  • Streamlit Session Part 4
  • Build Your Own Crypto Data Download App - Part 1
  • Turning Python Scripts into Working Web Apps Quickly with Streamlit
  • Install Streamlit on Ubuntu 20.04

Science and Tech

  • PCOS Predictor
  • Find Foods rich in some Nutrients
  • Machine Learning in Healthcare
  • Predict heart failure using ML
  • Welcome to Konvid-18 simulation

NLP and Language

  • WhatsApp Chat Analyzer @akiragondo
  • Wikipedia Word Cloud @georgeamccarthy
  • ParaTools @Adit_Magotra
  • An online wordcloud generator @BeyondMyself
  • Interactive LIME Visualizer
  • ETC app

CV and Images

  • Streamlit Mediapipe WebApp @Outsiders17711
  • Camera Hand Paint Web App
  • OCR Programa
  • TableNet: Table Detection from Document Images Streamlit Webapp

Sports

  • Customisable Shot Maps
  • Convocatorias selecciones EURO2021 en función del Big Data
  • Slide Show Presentation - Last 5 Olympics Top 10 Countries
  • Forbes Richest Athletes 1990-2019

Finance and Business

  • Credit Card App @lerekoqholosha
  • House Rocket Insights @RaulBelarmino
  • Finper @felipesanma
  • Credit Card Churn Classification
  • Fruit & Vegetable Prices at Izmir Wholesale Market
  • Kmag Bank
  • Annual Medical Charges Prediction App
  • Pairs Trading: A Statistical Arbitrage Strategy
  • Bank Customers Churn Prediction App
  • Churn Prediction
  • Financial Data Analysis: Version 1.3
  • Crypto Data Download App Preview Using Python, Streamlit, and CoinDCX Public APIs.

Geography and Society

  • Learn Geography! @Negmat_Mullodzhanov
  • leafmap streamlit demo
  • Jamaican House Price Predictor
  • Covid-19 Dashboard
  • House Rocket
  • Donation app | streamlit | python| quickstart
  • map using streamlit and folium

General

  • Titanic Survival @atheeralattar
  • Kunishou’s WEB Tools
  • Zhanin Melody Generator
  • 夏なのでPythonのStreamlitを用いて機械学習アプリケーションを作成してみた

Model Building and Training

  • Machine Learning Trial Room App
  • Interactive Machine Learning Dashboard

Cool happenings and other things

  • extra-streamlit-components 0.1.1.1
  • Learn how to build a customizable web UI using DVC and Streamlit 8/19 at 8am PDT

Follow us

  • Twitter
